core:process.core:name: Print Receipt
core:process.core:comment: Prints a receipt or other document requiring a transaction. Allow Retry, which is true by default, allows a prompt to continue/retry to be shown in the event of failure. Show Printing is true by default and means a 'Printing, please wait' message is shown when printing starts. If Show Printing is set false then on entry, printing is started but no prompt text is displayed - the intention is to allow the caller's last prompt to continue to be displayed, e.g. a change due message. If printing has not completed after 5 seconds, the prompt changes in any case to say 'please wait' and a cancel buton is made available. If printing fails and is retried, the please wait prompt is always displayed while retrying.

core:processNote.core:description: The variable 'ClaimAttempts' is really 'Failed Claim Attempts'. It is used only when the printer is shared. If non-zero, the prompt message is varied and the prompt timeout is set short. On prompt timeout if the printer is not claimed, further attempts are made up to a maximum of 3 failures.

core:executeScriptAction.core:comment: We set this explicitly to stop the ProcessDeviceEvents process responding to printer events. It is set automatically when printing starts, but the printer driver may have cleared it on raising the printer error event.

We set this explicitly to stop the ProcessDeviceEvents process responding to printer events. It is also set automatically when printing starts but the printer driver may have cleared it on raising the printer error event.

core:action.core:comment: Test if Retry Allowed - default true

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Give up on 3 failed claim attempts.

core:param.value: Error printing {printDocumentUrl}, Failed to claim printer.
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:action.core:comment: Test if Retry Allowed - default true

core:param.value: The printer was not released as the printer was not claimed.
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:promptState.core:name: Printing State
core:promptState.core:comment: Print receipt. Total prompt timeout is set greater than the default print timeout of 15 seconds.

core:promptState.core:name: Printing State
core:promptState.core:comment: Print receipt. Prompt timeout is set greater than the default print timeout of 15 seconds.

core:promptState.core:name: Printing State
core:promptState.core:comment: Print receipt. Total prompt timeout is set greater than the default print timeout of 15 seconds.
